  • Baltic Birch/Aircraft Plywood
  • Aluminum Sheet

  • Lexan/Polycarb

Just curious to see what others are considering for bumper backing material this year and at what thicknesses.

Especially want to know if anyone has tested doing polycarb backings? I was thinking 1/4" Lexan possibly with aluminum angle as a support might be a potentially very durable and lightweight option. Hoping to test it myself however the shop is closed due to the weather‚Ä¶
